columns.columnDescription: The unique identifier for the maintenance equipment entry
The name of the maintenance equipment
A description of the maintenance equipment
The model of the maintenance equipment
The manufacturer of the maintenance equipment
The serial number of the maintenance equipment
The date when the maintenance equipment was acquired
The current condition of the maintenance equipment (e.g., Good, Fair, New)
The date when the maintenance equipment was last maintained
The date when the next maintenance is scheduled for the equipment
